editor_style.activate_highlighted_syntax(notebook, theme_menu)¶

Enable/disable the syntax highlight

Parameters

  • notebook – Notebook panel

  • theme_menu (:class:Tools.ThemeMenu) – themes menu

editor_style.change_theme_choice(frame, theme_name)¶

Change the theme attribut on all panels

Parameters

  • frame – main window

  • theme_name (str) – theme selected

editor_style.customize_editor(editor, theme_choice)¶

Change theme of the Editor panel

Parameters

  • editor (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – EditWindow to customize

  • theme (str) – Theme to apply on the EditWindow

editor_style.customize_lexer_pystyle(editor, theme, font)¶

Change lexer python words by applying the theme and the font gived in parameters

Parameters

  • editor (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – EditWindow to apply the style

  • theme (list) – Theme to apply on the EditWindow python lexer

  • font (wx.Font) – font to apply on lexer

editor_style.customize_lexer_stcstyle(editor, theme, font)¶

Change lexer words stc style by applying the theme and the font gived in parameters

Parameters

  • editor (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – EditWindow to apply the style

  • theme (list) – Theme to apply on the EditWindow lexer

  • font (wx.Font) – font to apply on lexer

Init some settings for Editor Window

Parameters

editor (wx.py.editwindow.EditWindow) – editorWindow
